test.name: Check IP_Forward Status via SSH

kw.name: Open Connection
kw.doc: Opens a new SSH connection to the given ``host`` and ``port``.

kw.name: Login
kw.msg: Read output: Last login: Wed Feb 26 14:26:54 2025 from 10.70.0.4 [?2004h[root@CBM-2022070504 ~]#
kw.doc: Logs into the SSH server with the given ``username`` and ``password``.

kw.name: Execute Command
kw.doc: Executes ``command`` on the remote machine and returns its outputs.

kw.name: Log
kw.doc: Logs the given message with the given level.

kw.name: Should Be Equal As Numbers
kw.doc: Fails if objects are unequal after converting them to real numbers.

test.doc: Überprüfen Sie den Proxy-ARP-Status über SSH.

test.name: Run ARPING Command and Evaluate Output

kw.name: Run Process
kw.msg: Starting process: echo toor | sudo -S arping -c 10 -U -I enp2s0f1 10.57.0.1
kw.doc: Runs a process and waits for it to complete.

kw.name: Log
kw.msg:
[sudo] password for exceeding: ARPING 10.57.0.1 Timeout Timeout Timeout Timeout Timeout Timeout Timeout Timeout Timeout Timeout
--- 10.57.0.1 statistics --- 10 packets transmitted, 0 packets received, 100% unanswered (0 extra)
kw.doc: Logs the given message with the given level.

kw.name: Log
kw.msg:
[sudo] password for exceeding: ARPING 10.57.0.1 Timeout Timeout Timeout Timeout Timeout Timeout Timeout Timeout Timeout Timeout
--- 10.57.0.1 statistics --- 10 packets transmitted, 0 packets received, 100% unanswered (0 extra)
kw.doc: Logs the given message with the given level.

kw.name: Evaluate
kw.doc: Evaluates the given expression in Python and returns the result.

kw.name: Should Be True
kw.arg: "Expected 100% unanswered packets, but some responses were received."
kw.doc: Fails if the given condition is not true.

test.doc: Führt das ARPING-Kommando direkt mit dem festgelegten Interface von testmachine aus und überprüft die Ausgabe.
